mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def calculate_greatest_min_distance(T, bags):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        n = len(bags[i])
        a = bags[i]
        x = Counter(a)
        m = max(x.values())
        s = list(x.values()).count(m)
        x = n + s * m
        x = x // (m - 1)
        results.append(x + s - 1)
    return results

        x = n * (s * m)
        x = x // (m - 1)
        results.append(x + s - 1)
    return results
